A hanger with a built-in scale: This clothes hanger would have a small scale integrated into it, allowing users to easily measure the weight of their clothes without having to use a separate scale. This would be particularly useful for people who are trying to track their weight or monitor their clothing's weight over time.

A hanger with a UV sanitizing feature: This clothes hanger would have a built-in UV light that sanitizes the clothes as they hang. This would be especially useful for people who have sensitive skin or allergies, as it would help to reduce the amount of dust and allergens in their clothing.

A hanger with a built-in steamer: This clothes hanger would have a small steam function built into it, allowing users to quickly and easily steam their clothes as they hang. This would be particularly useful for people who are short on time and want to quickly refresh their clothes without having to take them to a dry cleaner.

A hanger with a smart tag: This clothes hanger would have a small tag that can be attached to the hanger and used to track the location and ownership of the clothes. This would be especially useful for people who are always losing their clothes or having trouble keeping track of their wardrobe.

A hanger with a built-in perfume dispenser: This clothes hanger would have a small perfume dispenser built into it, allowing users to apply a fresh scent to their clothes as they hang. This would be particularly useful for people who want to add a subtle scent to their clothes without having to apply it directly to their body.
